answers.answer: Need clarification first.Meds your onAge and genderWhat time was the last ACTH test done? AM - PM?What conditions do you have?
Sorry! 30 year old female no meds. History of endometriosis. Endo ruling out secondary hypoT and looking at my adrenal levels. My endometriosis specialist confirmed no PCOS. Thanks for help!!!!
Oops forgot to say I have all of the symptoms of hypoT. As a kid I had precocious andrenarche that was left untreated.

I should also add that I was fine after my first pregnancy but my 2nd pregnancy I developed gestational diabetes(has resolved). I lost all the weight & more after birth. But 7 months after that I rapidly started gaining weight, my hair started falling out, I was always cold and the exhaustion and brain fog set in! Unfortunately I didn't do anything about it, I chalked it up to hormones going crazy after pregnancy. Now I am trying to get it under control.
I dont see a FREE T3 test done.This is important.
Have you been tested for thyroid antibodies to check for Hashimoto's or Graves Disease? It's possible to have an autoimmune disease, and still have normal thyroid labs.  Agree that you need the FT3.
I haven't been tested for any antibodies or a free t3. I will ask my endo about doing them.

question: Ok so my endo ran all kinds of labs and I am not sure what any of these mean.(17-OH Progesterone ACTH Stimu.)17-OH Progesterone Baseline 65 range 30-10017-OH Progesterone Stimulated 64 range (it just says not estab.)Coritsol 15.2 Range 6.2-19.4TSH 0.8 range .5-4.5Free T4 1.13 range .82-1.77Free Testosterone 0.7 range 0-2.2Testosterone, Serum 78 range 6-82DHEA 393 range 31-701DHEAS 377.7 range 45 - 270Luteinizing Hormone (LH) 10.6 range 2.4-12.6FSH, Serum 3.9 range 3.5-12.5Prolactin 12.1 range 4.8-23.3Estradiol 208.9 range 12.5-166.0My previous test were 1 month ago:Free T4 1.18 range .82-1.77TSH 1.12 range .45-4.5cortisol 17.6 range 2.3-11.9 (PM)T3 141 range 71-1802 Month ago DHEA-S 288 (45 - 270)It looks like my DHEA-S is going up, is that normal?And my cortisol is higher at noon than at 8 am????17-OH Progesterone Stimulated went down from the baseline, I thought if it was stimulated it should go up????Anyone that can help I would be very grateful for the advice or info!
title: Please HELP...new labs,no idea what they mean!
